acceptBid(bytes32,uint256).details: Will be reverted if the seller has already accepted a bid

params._bidIdx: Index of the bid in bids list

listNFT(bytes,uint8,bytes32,bytes32,uint.details: User should sign the txId of the NFT with the same private key that holds the NFT if isSignRequired is true

params._bitcoinPubKey: Bitcoin PubKey of the NFT holder (without starting '04'). Don't need to be passed in the case of Taproot
params._outputIdx: Index of the output that includes NFT
params._r: Part of signature of _bitcoinPubKey for the txId (or `e` challenge for schnorr sig)
params._s: Part of signature of _bitcoinPubKey for the txId
params._satoshiIdx: Index of the inscribed satoshi in the output satoshis
params._scriptType: Type of the account that holds the NFT
params._v: is needed for recovering the public key (it can be 27 or 28)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

putBid(bytes32,address,bytes,uint8).details: User sends the bid amount along with the request

params._buyerBTCScript: Seller will send the NFT to the provided script (it doesn't include op_codes)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revokeBid(bytes32,address,uint256).details: Buyers can withdraw their funds after deadline       (deadline is 0 for a non-accepted bid, so they can withdaw at any time)Only bid owner can call this function

params._bidIdx: Index of the bid in bids list
Index of the accepted bid in bids list
params._inputTxs: List of all transactions that were spent by _transferTx before the input that spent the NFT
params._outputNFTIdx: Index of output that includes NFT
params._transferTx: transaction that transffred NFT from seller to buyer

setTransferDeadline(uint256).details: Deadline should be greater than relay finalization parameter

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

_bytesToAddress(bytes).notice: Convert bytes with length 20 to address

_convertToBytes32(bytes).notice: Convert bytes with length 32 to bytes32

acceptBid(bytes32,uint256).notice: Accepts one of the existing bids

pause().notice: Pause the contract so only the functions can be called which are whenPaused

putBid(bytes32,address,bytes,uint8).notice: Puts bid for buyying an NTF

sellNFT(bytes32,address,uint256,(bytes4,.notice: Sends ETH to seller after checking the proof of transfer

setTransferDeadline(uint256).notice: Setter for deadline of sending NFT

unpause().notice: Unpause the contract so only the functions can be called which are whenNotPaused
